statements.select:
SELECT MAX(S.BIN_NO) MaxBinNo FROM PSB_BIN_STATUS S WHERE 1=1
S.BIN_NO LIKE #where.BinStart#+'%'

SELECT F.*, T1.MATER_NO, T1.MATER_NAME, T1.PALLET_NO, T1.PRODUCT_DATE, T.CREATION_DATE FROM PSB_BIN_STATUS F LEFT JOIN WBS_BIN T ON T.BIN_NO = F.BIN_NO LEFT JOIN WBS_PACKAGE_DATA T1 ON T1.PACKAGE_GUID = T.PACKAGE_GUID
F.BIN_NO LIKE #where.BinStart#+'%'
ORDER BY F.BIN_NO

SELECT TA.*,CONVERT(VARCHAR,ROUND(TA.FG_BIN/TA.TOTAL_BIN,2)*100)+'%' AS USE_RATE, CONVERT(VARCHAR,(1-ROUND(TA.DISA_BIN/TA.TOTAL_BIN,2))*100)+'%' AS STO_RATE FROM ( SELECT SUBSTRING(T.BIN_NO, 1, 2) AS ROW_NO, COUNT(CASE T.BIN_STATUS WHEN CHAR(36) THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS FG_BIN, -------------物料 COUNT(CASE T.BIN_STATUS WHEN '_' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS EMPTY_BIN, -------------空库位 COUNT(CASE T.USED_FLAG WHEN 0 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS DISA_BIN, -------------禁用库位 (COUNT(CASE T.BIN_BIZ_STATUS WHEN 'P' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) + COUNT(CASE T.BIN_BIZ_STATUS WHEN 'E' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END)) AS ERR_BIN, -------------异常库位(空出库位，先入库位) (COUNT(CASE T.BIN_BIZ_STATUS WHEN 'I' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) + COUNT(CASE T.BIN_BIZ_STATUS WHEN 'O' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END)) AS RES_BIN, -------------预约库位 COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_BIN FROM PSB_BIN_STATUS T GROUP BY SUBSTRING(BIN_NO, 1, 2) -------------总库位 UNION SELECT '总计' AS ROW_NO, COUNT(CASE BIN_STATUS WHEN CHAR(36) THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS FG_BIN, -------------物料 COUNT(CASE BIN_STATUS WHEN '_' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS EMPTY_BIN, -------------空库位 COUNT(CASE T.USED_FLAG WHEN 0 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS DISA_BIN, -------------禁用库位 ( COUNT(CASE BIN_BIZ_STATUS WHEN 'P' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) + COUNT(CASE BIN_BIZ_STATUS WHEN 'E' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END)) AS ERR_BIN, -------------异常库位(空出库位，先入库位) (COUNT(CASE T.BIN_BIZ_STATUS WHEN 'I' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) + COUNT(CASE T.BIN_BIZ_STATUS WHEN 'O' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END)) AS RES_BIN, -------------预约库位 COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_BIN FROM PSB_BIN_STATUS T ) TA

SELECT PRODUCT_ID,MINO,GRADE,MIN_DATE,MAX_DATE,AQTY,PQTY FROM Z30_BIN_STORE T
ORDER BY T.PRODUCT_ID DESC

SELECT PRODUCT_ID,MINO,GRADE,BATCH_NO,MIN_DATE,MAX_DATE,AQTY,PQTY FROM Z30_BIN_STORE_BATCHNO T
ORDER BY T.BATCHNO,T.PRODUCT_ID ,T.MINO,T.GRADE

SELECT T.*, CASE WHEN T.BIN_BIZ_STATUS = 'E' THEN '空出库' WHEN T.BIN_BIZ_STATUS = 'P' THEN '先入品' WHEN T.BIN_STATUS != '_' AND T1.PACKAGE_GUID IS NULL THEN '库位有货,库存无记录' WHEN T.BIN_STATUS = '_' AND T1.PACKAGE_GUID IS NOT NULL THEN '库位无货,库存有信息' WHEN T.BIN_BIZ_STATUS = 'I' THEN '入库占用异常' WHEN T.BIN_BIZ_STATUS = 'O' THEN '出库占用异常' END ERR_NAME FROM PSB_BIN_STATUS T LEFT JOIN WBS_BIN T1 ON T1.BIN_NO = T.BIN_NO WHERE T.BIN_BIZ_STATUS IN ('E','P') OR (T.BIN_STATUS != '_' AND T1.PACKAGE_GUID IS NULL) OR (T.BIN_STATUS = '_' AND T1.PACKAGE_GUID IS NOT NULL) OR (T.BIN_BIZ_STATUS IN ('I','O') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WBS_TASK F WHERE F.SLOC_NO = T.BIN_NO OR F.ELOC_NO = T.BIN_NO))
ORDER BY T.BIN_NO

SELECT T.BIN_NO,T.PALLET_NO,T1.MATER_NO,T1.MATER_NAME,ISNULL(T1.PRODUCT_QTY,1) as QTY,T1.PRODUCT_DATE FROM WBS_BIN T JOIN WBS_PACKAGE_DATA T1 ON T.PACKAGE_GUID = T1.PACKAGE_GUID
t.BIN_NO = #where.BIN_NO#
t.PALLET_NO like '%'+ #where.PALLET_NO# +'%'
t1.MATER_NO like '%'+ #where.MATERIAL_NO#+ '%'
ORDER BY $OrderString$
